title: How to Make Quassia Spray

steps.headline: Boil the quassia chips in a large pot of water for half an hour.
Strain off the water while still warm.
Dilute for use.
steps.description: Mix 1 part of the quassia and soap solution with 2 parts cold water. Pour into a spray bottle.

steps.headline: Spray onto plants with problem insects.
steps.description: Or spray where you wish to deter possums from walking.

text: Boil the quassia chips in a large pot of water for half an hour.  Strain off the water while still warm.  Mix with the soap flakes.  Dilute for use. Mix 1 part of the quassia and soap solution with 2 parts cold water. Pour into a spray bottle. Spray onto plants with problem insects. Or spray where you wish to deter possums from walking.
